activities: We are an airfare auditing company that provides auditing services to corporations.  Upon completion of the PNR (Passenger Name Record) by the travel agency, they "queue" this information to us electronically and we verify that the lowest fare was obtained within the policy guidelines set by the corporation.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA).  The organization also agrees to cooperate with the European Union data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
